# Lab 03 Copilot Instructions - Custom functions

Folder: `Labfiles/03-agent-custom-functions/dotnet`

Planned projects:

- `SupportTicketAgent` (console app) – demonstrates function/tool calling
- `SupportSkillsFunctionApp` (Azure Functions) – exposes an HTTP endpoint that is compatible with Azure AI Search custom skillset requests

## Status

- Scaffolding in progress.
